title: Systematic Competency Development Program for Conservation Professionals

context.prior_knowledge: Basic conservation science theory and practical experience
context.additional_context: Blended education combining smartphone-based mobile learning and monthly face-to-face workshops, emphasizing a balance between organizational learning support and personal growth

learning_goals: Learners can apply three or more approaches combining cutting-edge technologies with traditional methods when planning conservation projects within six months
Learners can create and execute professional development plans that harmonize organizational goals with personal growth
Learners can analyze five or more conservation technology innovation cases based on peer expert feedback and apply them to practical work

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
